q: State of the Union address to propose cuts in Social Security. "I hope that information is wrong and that you will stand by your campaign promises to strengthen Social Security," read the letter from Sen. Bernie Sanders . I urge you once again to make it clear to the American people that under your watch we will not cut Social Security benefits, raise the retirement age or privatize this critical program. The message is being echoed by labor unions, senior groups and religious organizations as the State of the Union Address approaches. "Let's get one thing straight right at the beginning: Social Security

"This was very much Andy Coulson 's decision," one Downing Street source said. The prime minister, who has obviously been very supportive of Andy Coulson , did not want him to resign. But the prime minister did accept that the pressure had made it difficult for him to do the job at 110%. the idea of a Teen Idol show in the past, The X Factor is going there from the start and beyond. Singers aged 12 and up are welcome to audition. There is no upper age limit. I like the idea that a 12-year old on this show can compete with an older singer and a singing group, Simon Cowell said in a statement. "I've never believed there should be a cut-off age for talent." well as advising founders Larry Page and Sergey Brin . "We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time," Eric Schmidt said. By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. In my clear opinion, Larry is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come.
